ygData.subject: Boat problems
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure what to do, maybe someone has some advice for me. While sitting calmly on the deck of the boat on my way to Faydwer, I suddenly found myself
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure what to do, maybe someone has some advice for me. While sitting
calmly on the deck of the boat on my way to Faydwer, I suddenly found myself
sitting on a rock in the middle of OOT surrounded by Sirens and Aqua-goblins
with the boat nowhere in sight. I have been stuck there for 2 days now. I
petitioned immediately of course, but there were no GM's on then. I have
logged back in morning, afternoon, and evening but only once saw a GM log
on. They were on less than 5 minutes and logged off again without answering
my petition. I've tried to catch the boat in passing, but don't stand a
chance of catching it. I don't want to abandon my bard, my guild has
invested too much into helping me catch up with them in levels.

Zendarin
The Wandering Minstrel
Frustrated on Fennin Ro
